statements: SELECT * FROM FoodWasteData
SELECT id, food_item, amount_purchased FROM FoodWasteData WHERE location='Kitchen' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT food_item, amount_purchased, amount_wasted FROM FoodWasteData WHERE amount_wasted > 0.5
SELECT * FROM FoodWasteData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY amount_wasted DESC
SELECT location, SUM(amount_purchased) AS total_purchased FROM FoodWasteData GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_purchased DESC
SELECT * FROM FoodWasteData WHERE location = 'Kitchen' AND amount_wasted > amount_purchased;
SELECT food_item, SUM(amount_wasted) as total_wasted FROM FoodWasteData GROUP BY food_item;
SELECT AVG(amount_purchased) as avg_purchased, AVG(amount_wasted) as avg_wasted FROM FoodWasteData WHERE location = 'Dining Hall';
SELECT id, food_item, amount_purchased, amount_wasted, location, date FROM FoodWasteData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM FoodWasteData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM FoodWasteData;
SELECT food_item, quantity FROM FoodWasteData WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT food_item, quantity, date_added FROM FoodWasteData ORDER BY date_added DESC;
SELECT food_item, quantity, date_added FROM FoodWasteData WHERE id = 5;
SELECT waste_category, analysis_date, quantity_wasted FROM WasteAnalysis WHERE analysis_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM FoodWasteData WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY date_added DESC;
SELECT food_item, quantity, date_added FROM FoodWasteData WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY quantity ASC, date_added DESC;
SELECT food_item, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM FoodWasteData GROUP BY food_item HAVING total_quantity > 500 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;

SELECT fd.food_item, wa.waste_category, wa.quantity_wasted FROM FoodWasteData fd INNER JOIN WasteAnalysis wa ON fd.id = wa.food_item_id WHERE wa.analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY wa.quantity_wasted DESC, fd.food_item ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records, AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM FoodWasteData;
SELECT * FROM food_waste_data ORDER BY date_recorded DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT food_item, waste_amount FROM food_waste_data WHERE waste_amount > 100;
SELECT category_name FROM waste_categories WHERE category_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM waste_reduction_opportunities WHERE reduction_potential > 0.5 ORDER BY opportunity_name ASC;
SELECT id, food_item, waste_amount, date_recorded FROM food_waste_data WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM food_waste_data WHERE waste_amount > 100 ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT food_item, waste_amount FROM food_waste_data WHERE waste_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM waste_categories WHERE category_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT w.opportunity_name, w.reduction_potential, f.food_item FROM waste_reduction_opportunities w JOIN food_waste_data f ON w.opportunity_id = f.id;
SELECT MAX(waste_amount) AS max_waste_amount, MIN(waste_amount) AS min_waste_amount FROM food_waste_data;
SELECT * FROM FoodWasteData;
SELECT ProductName, Quantity FROM FoodWasteData WHERE Quantity > 100;
SELECT Date, Quantity FROM FoodWasteData ORDER BY Date DESC;
SELECT CategoryName, Description FROM FoodCategories WHERE CategoryID = 2;
SELECT LocationName, Address FROM WasteLocations WHERE Address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM FoodWasteData ORDER BY Quantity DESC;
SELECT ProductName, Quantity FROM FoodWasteData WHERE Quantity > 100;
SELECT CategoryName, Description FROM FoodCategories WHERE CategoryName LIKE 'Fruits%';
SELECT * FROM WasteLocations WHERE Address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT LocationID, LocationName, Address FROM WasteLocations ORDER BY LocationName ASC;
SELECT * FROM FoodWasteData;
SELECT item_name, quantity, date_recorded FROM FoodWasteData ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT category_name, description FROM FoodCategories WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, address, contact_person FROM WasteLocations WHERE location_id > 3;
SELECT opportunity_description, cost_savings FROM ReductionOpportunities WHERE cost_savings > 1000 ORDER BY cost_savings DESC;
SELECT * FROM FoodWasteData
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM FoodWasteData WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name DESC
SELECT category_name, description FROM FoodCategories WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(description) > 50 ORDER BY category_name ASC
SELECT location_name, address, contact_person FROM WasteLocations WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(contact_person) < 20 ORDER BY location_name ASC
SELECT opportunity_description, cost_savings FROM ReductionOpportunities WHERE cost_savings > 1000 ORDER BY cost_savings DESC
